ایس یو-57 کو ابھی تک کوئی باقاعدہ نیٹو ر: Does the Su-57 have a NATO reporting name? NATO reporting name for Su-57
The Sukhoi Su-57 (Russian: Сухой Су-57; NATO reporting name: Felon) is a twin-engine stealth multirole fighter aircraft developed by Sukhoi.
Does the Su-57 have a NATO reporting name? NATO reporting name for Su-57

The Sukhoi Su-57, a fifth-generation fighter jet, was given the NATO reporting name "Felon" following a convention where aircraft are assigned names based on their type: bombers get names starting with "B" (e.g., "Bear" for the Tu-95), fighters with "F" (e.g., "Flanker" for the Su-27), and so on.
